Relax and re-energise in the exotic and picturesque grounds of Paradise Health Club! This bundle includes:

 * Paradise Health Club: Head Towel (Female) (White) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Head Towel (Male) (Black) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Head Towel (Female) (Black) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Cooling Cucumber (Male) * Paradise Health Club: Cooling Cucumber (Female) * Paradise Health Club: Chair

 * Paradise Health Club: Yoga Poses 1 (Female) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Yoga Poses 2 (Male) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Yoga Poses 2 (Female) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Yoga Poses 3 (Male) 
 * Paradise Health Club: Yoga Poses 3 (Female)
